mapper.select: select distinct r.role_name from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.id = #{value} order by r.id
select distinct r.role_name from sys_permission p left join sys_role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id left join sys_role r on rp.role_id = r.id where p.id = #{value} order by r.id
